game.subtitle: A festive Christmas dice game for the whole family!
game.description: Pass the Present is a fun Christmas gift exchange game played with dice and cards. The game consists of three rounds where players exchange, unwrap, and secure gifts.
game.round1Summary: Round 1: Distribute all gifts from the table
game.round2Summary: Round 2: Unwrap gifts and continue trading
game.heroTitle: The Ultimate Christmas Gift Exchange Game
game.heroSubtitle: Bring laughter, excitement, and friendly competition to your holiday gathering with this interactive dice and card game.
game.heroCatchphrase: No printer or dice? Say less, we got you.
game.whyPlaySubtitle: Perfect for family gatherings, office parties, and holiday celebrations
game.benefit1Description: Simple rules that everyone can understand in minutes. Just roll the dice and follow the instructions!
game.benefit2Description: Designed for 4-20 players of all ages. Three difficulty modes ensure fun for everyone, from kids to grandparents.
game.benefit3Description: Customize round durations to fit your schedule. Play a quick 30-minute game or extend it for a full evening of fun.
game.benefit4Description: Digital dice, timer warnings, and surprise cards keep everyone engaged. No more boring gift exchanges!
game.benefit5Description: Beautiful Christmas-themed design with smooth animations and festive colors that enhance the holiday spirit.
game.benefit6Description: Everything you need is digital. No printing, cutting, or preparation. Just open and play!
game.quickStartDescription: Get started in three simple steps
game.step2: Configure your game settings (timer, difficulty mode)
game.step3: Roll the dice and let the fun begin!
game.readyToPlayDescription: Start your Christmas gift exchange adventure now

round1.title: Round 1
round1.description: In this round, all wrapped gifts on the table come into play. Use this app as your deck: whenever someone has to ‚Äútake a game card‚Äù, tap the Pick a card button to reveal a digital card with the instruction. Chance cards are automatically mixed in, so you don‚Äôt need to print or shuffle anything yourself. When everyone is ready and gifts are in the middle, start the round and follow the dice and card actions. Good luck!

diceRules.2: Swap one of your gifts with someone else's gift
diceRules.3: The game changes direction. The person who was before you is now next.
diceRules.5: Give a gift from the table to someone else
diceRules.6: Take a gift of your choice from the table

round2.title: Round 2
round2.description: In Round 2 the game continues with more focus on unwrapping gifts. The Round 2 cards are being played now combined with the remaining special actions. Keep playing in the same order as you ended Round 1: roll the dice, tap Pick a card when instructed, and follow the digital card text on screen to move, swap or unwrap gifts. Good luck!

diceRules.2: Give a gift from yourself to someone else. No gift? Take a playing card!
diceRules.3: The game changes direction. The person whose turn it was before you is now next.
diceRules.5: Swap two gifts from different owners with each other
diceRules.6: Unwrap one of the gifts in your possession. No gift? Take a playing card!

round3.title: Round 3
round3.description: In this final round, we're using the Round 3 cards to decide which gifts are secured and which can still move. Keep the current turn order, roll the dice, and draw cards when instructed. Play until the timer ends (or until you decide to stop), then see which gifts everyone ends up taking home. May the best Sneaky Santa win!

round1.card1: Everyone takes a sip. If you don't drink alcohol, do a small dare instead.

round3.card4: Take a gift from someone and both take a sip to seal the deal.
round3.card5: Give one of your gifts away. The new owner chooses who takes three sips.

theGame.title: The Game
theGame.description: The game is played in three rounds. Round 1 ends when all gifts are off the table. Agree on a playing time for Round 2 and Round 3, for example 20, 30 or 45 minutes. The timer, cards and (optional) digital dice are all handled by this website, so you can focus on playing.
